content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Hello Max, I am happy to have you here. The rental price for this brand new, centrally located 50 square meter apartment is 900 Euros per month.

If you want to continue the negotiation, please provide your offer. Remember, I am looking for the highest possible price.

If you are not willing to pay this price, please let me know the reason and we can terminate the negotiation.

Looking forward to your response.
